pages.title: Common Hippo
pages.text: The hippopotamus ($(o) HIP-ə-POT-ə-məs; Hippopotamus amphibius$()), also called the hippo, common hippopotamus, or river hippopotamus, is a large semiaquatic mammal native to sub-Saharan Africa.

pages.title: Common Hippo
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Randomly active$(br2)3 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:flora_water_hyacinth_item$(br2)Number of Offspring: 1$(br2)Growth time: 8 Days
